attributes.action: Intervene with regard to the Ofsted investigation of two Police Officers in Milton Keynes for illegal childminding and set about to review and change said policy to accommodate reciprocal arrangements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ofsted has acted on information provided by a neighbour with regard to two Police Officers in Milton Keynes who have a reciprocal arrangement to look after eachothers children when the other is at work. They are investigating this, possibly with a view to prosecute. The government encourages women to return to work and such arrangements should be allowed, with the rules being applied for what it is intended which is to clamp down on illegal childminding businesses. Stop the investigation and amend the policy now!

rejection.details: Please remove reference to individual cases and focus on the policy you would like changed. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the relevant department.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
